title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Military Camps in Southern Lebanon in Response to Missile Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Several targets in a Hezbollah military camp in southern Lebanon were attacked; IDF struck the area from which missiles were launched this morning towards the Upper Galilee.

Earlier today, fighter jets attacked several military buildings in a Hezbollah military camp located in the village area of Blat in southern Lebanon, from which missiles were launched this morning towards the Upper Galilee.

In addition, fighter jets attacked military buildings in the areas of Al-Jibin, Al-Khayam, Ayta ash-Shab, and Tir Harfa in southern Lebanon.

Moreover, the IDF fired artillery shells to eliminate threats several times in the Seven region in southern Lebanon.
